Panel.headerText: What is Ceiling fan New Purchase programme?

html:div.html:h5: Under Demand Side Management (DSM) Tata Power has initiated several programmes to promote energy efficiency at consumer premises and the programmes are approved by Maharashtra Electricity Regulatory Commission (MERC). The program objective is to reduce electricity consumption and enhance energy efficiency. The programme is launched by Tata Power in tie up with M/s Atomberg Technologies Pvt Ltd(Atomberg Technologies). Currently, the program is offered to Residential Consumers of Tata Power. Under this program the eligible consumer gets an opportunity to purchase new Gorilla Energy Efficient Ceiling Fans, which reduces power consumption by at least 60% thereby reducing their electricity bill in long run. The programme is offered under new purchase (without exchange) scheme.

Panel.headerText: What are credentials of Atomberg Technologies?

html:div.html:h5: M/s Atomberg Technologies is a company started in the year 2012 by IIT-B alumni, with a strong core team of IIT-IIM alumni in place, a state of the art R & D facility, and backing from SEBI registered venture investors

Panel.headerText: Why use Gorilla fans and how do they differ from existing (current/old) ones?

html:div.html:h5: The new ceiling fans offered under the programme are Super Energy Efficient Fan and are certified by BEE. The 5 star rated ceiling fan offered under this program typically consumes around 30 W, whereas the old ceiling fans consume around 75 W. This results into saving 45W of power per fan.

Panel.headerText: What are the details of the Ceiling fan?

html:div.html:h5: The ceiling fan offered under this program is of 1200mm. It has got air delivery of 220 Cu Mtr/Min and Service Value of 7.0. Service value of a ceiling is the ratio of air delivery to the power input. The scheme is available under New Purchase option only.

Panel.headerText: What are the details of the Ceiling fan?

html:div.html:h5: The ceiling fan offered under this program is of 1200mm. It has got air delivery of 220 Cu Mtr /Min and Service Value of 7.0. Service value of a ceiling is the ratio of air delivery to the power input. The scheme is available under New Purchase option only.

Panel.headerText: What are annual savings if I install the fan?

html:div.html:h5: Considering 10 running hours per day and approximate rate of Rs.6.00 per unit, the approximate annual savings would be Rs 810 per fan. (Actual saving depends on fan usage and cost of electricity)..

Panel.headerText: How many Fans can I avail?

html:div.html:h5: Each Residential consumer is eligible to purchase maximum four fans.

Panel.headerText: What happens if I need more fans than my eligibility limit?

html:div.html:h5: The rebate offered is available for maximum four fans only for each consumer.

Panel.headerText: What would be guarantee of these fans?

html:div.html:h5: Three years warranty is provided by Atomberg on the fans purchased under this programme. The warranty card would be given to you by Atomberg.

Panel.headerText: What shall I do in case of fans failure?

html:div.html:h5: Please call Atomberg call centre at 022-65352777. Please retain your warrantee card and bill safely. The details are also provided on warranty card.

Panel.headerText: What will be the execution Process?

html:div.html:h5:
After registration by you, a franchisee of M/s Atomberg will give you a call within 30 days from the date of registration and confirm your order and requirement/model also your choice .On an appointed day,electrician will visit your premises. He would be carrying an ID card authorized by Atomberg.
He will deliver the fans of your choice and issue warranty card and an invoice.
Consumer can make the payment through a)Online payment facility b)Cheque/DD and c)Cash.In case the consumer wants to pay be cheque, he need to send the cheque in advance and after realisation of cheque the delivery will be carried out.
After the delivery, consumer will be requested to sign the job completion and acknowledgement form.

Panel.headerText: What are the documents which will be required at the time of installation?

html:div.html:h5: You will require your latest paid electricity bill.
Limited number of fans is approved under this programme. The program will be closed after the approved quantity is booked. The consumer will be enrolled on first come first serve basis.

Panel.headerText: What is the role of Tata Power?

html:div.html:h5: Tata Power has rolled out the programme and offered special rebate to help the consumers to replace their inefficient appliance by new super energy efficient appliance. Tata Power is only a facilitator of this Programme and its role & liability is restricted only to offering a rebate to the manufacturer. The warranty for the ceiling fans is provided by Atomberg and any future issue regarding product and warranty etc. shall be directly dealt with Atomberg without involving Tata Power. Tata Power shall not be responsible in any manner (financial or otherwise) for any issues relating to this Programme or the product in future. Tata Power's decision in all respects for issues/ disputes/differences shall be final.

Panel.headerText: Where can one buy spare remote and what will be the cost of the same?

html:div.html:h5: Spare remotes can be purchased from Atomberg Website, for INR 250 whcih will be inclusive of delivery charges.

Panel.headerText: How to operate the fan when the remote is not functioning?

html:div.html:h5: In case of a problem one can toggle the switch to vary the speed of the fan. If the user wants to sent the fan on speed 3, he will have to turn on and off the switch for 4 times,if he again wants to shift it to speed 1 then he will have to turn on and off the fan for 2 times. So to set the speed of the fan via remote one need to turn on and off the switch for required speed+ 1 number of times
